I will take the Baker!  PM sent

T205 Common Sale:

Free s/h; Payment:  Paypal gift preferred; Paypal goods please add 3%.  Check/MO fine; “I’ll take it” will take precedent over ongoing correspondences.

PM OK but much prefer:

Correspondence to – [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

The following 24 commons are quite consistently VG (imo :rolleyes:), so I'll keep pricing simple:

1 card – 37 each
2 – 4  cards – 35 each
5+ cards – 33 each

*** SOLD:  Dahlen, Karger, Turner (note to self:  learn more about T205s before listing :(:rolleyes:), Mullin, Rucker (SC), Shean

Damn you Dennis, those SP's were gonna make my weekend! Nice pick up lol and sorry about your loss Scott. If it makes you feel better I parted with a 1990 Frank Thomas NNOF for a mere $5 when I was a teenager. This is what makes the hobby fun though.

Scott,

Email sent for Collins and some commons (If available)

Thanks.
